headline.main: SOUTH AMERICA.; News from Ecuador-- Departure of the United States Minister from Peru -- Miscellaneous Intelligence from Bolivia and Chili. The British steamer Lima arrived at Panama on the 22d, with Valparaiso dates to the 2d, and Lima and Callao to the 14th. ECUADOR. PERU. BOLIVIA. CHILI. Later from Havana. ARRIVAL OF THE CAHAWBA. Mails for the Pacific.

byline.original: MINISTRY OF FOREIGN RELATIONS OF PERU

docs.snippet: The undersigned, Minister of Foreign Relations of Peru, has had the honor of receiving the appreciable official dispatch which His Excellency the Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary of the United States has been pleased to direct to him,...

headline.main: OUR DIFFICULTIES WITH PERU.; The Diplomatic Correspondence Between the two Governments.[Continued and Concluded from the TIMES of Monday Morning.]

docs.lead_paragraph: The undersigned, Minister of Foreign Relations of Peru, has had the honor of receiving the appreciable official dispatch which His Excellency the Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary of the United States has been pleased to direct to him, under date of June 5, last, with the object of communicating to him that he had received instructions from the Government of the United States to submit to that of Peru, the following propositions:

headline.main: MRS. WINSLOW'S SOOTHING SYRUP; FOR CHILDREN TEETHING. LETTER FROM A MOTHER IN LOWELL, MASS.

docs.lead_paragraph: DEAR SIR: I am happy to be able to certify to the efficiency of MRS. WINSLOW'S SOOTHING SYRUP, and to the truth of what it is represented to accomplish. headline.main: Action on a Married Woman's Note Is Mrs.; Sinclair Still the Wife of Edwin Forrest? COMMON PLEAS. Court of General Sessions. Decisions.

docs.lead_paragraph: Before Judge Daly. Augustus B. Heriott et al. vs. Catharine N. Sinclair. This is an action by the plaintiff as assignee of John Beck and others engaged with him in business, upon the note of Mrs. Sinclair, made several years ago for $552.35. The note was given for goods sold to the defendant subsequently to her divorce from her husband.

docs.snippet: The prosecution waived the cross-examination of David Stuart.

headline.main: OUR OWN CORRESPONDENCE.; SOUTH CAROLINA. MEETING OF THE LEGISLATURE REPORT OF THE MILITARY COMMITTEE, &C. PUBLIC SENTIMENT IN CHARLESTON SOUTH CAROLINA DETERMINED TO SECEDE. THE SECESSION MOVEMENT.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Legislature met at 7 o'clock last night There being a full attendance of members, both Houses at once proceeded to business. In the Senate, Mr. ALSTON, from the Military Committee, submitted a report and bill, which were read and made the order of the day for to-day.
